RT Tickets Resolved/Code Changes For ZMap 0.1.113

Last Release Date: 21/02/2011

Current Release Date: 24 February 2011

This report covers 2011-02-21 to 2011-02-24

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved


Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_02_21.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.2588/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindowInfoPanel.c: small format changes only.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTranscriptFeature.c: correct line intron extent.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark_P.h: commenting only.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: add missing function, somehow not committed ??
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: temp. fix for dna not showing.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: implemented scode mode by percent id
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: fix stupid/bad bug in gaps parsing code causing it to fail unpredictably.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapView.h: remove unused struct from select return struct.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWindow.h: add new call to register remote client + new remote return code to select.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: add new return codes for client errors etc. to send codes.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControl.c: remove unused code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: sendcommand now returns a proper send response code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add code to register remote client existence with all zmapWindows
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteSend.c: add code to return proper send response code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView_P.h: send command now returns proper send response code.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowFeatureShow.c, zmapWindow_P.h: xremote calls now return proper send response codes, calls now handle timeout from client.
